item.title: CVE-2022-40132|2024-09-16T16:58:47.001Z -- castos -- seriously%20simple%20podcasting%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Seriously Simple Podcasting plugin <= 2.16.0 at WordPress, leading to plugin settings change.
